	Candidates must also be ready to resume immediately or within a maximum of 1-week notice period.


Requirements


	Minimum of 1 year of experience as a cashier or a related role.
	Educational qualification: OND, HND, or B.Sc.
	Age: Not above 35 years old.
	Must reside around Marina CMS, Lagos Island (e.g., Obalende, CMS, Ebute Metta, etc.).
	Strong numerical and organizational skills.
	Must be available to resume immediately or within a maximum of 1-week notice period.
